decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | The intensity of the illumination shall not exceed 200 lumens.  REASON:	In the interest of amenity and/or highway safety. | Before the development commences, details of the aluminium shopfront framing, the painted decoration on the fascia, and the position of the shutter box in respect to the shopfront, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority, and the details as approved shall be implemented prior to first occupation.  REASON:  In the interests of the visual character and appearance of the area. | Before the development commences, details of the colour of the rod and link grille shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority and the details as approved shall be implemented prior to first occupation.  REASON:  In the interests of the visual character and appearance of the area.
